About the Company: Refnol Resins & Chemicals Ltd operates five business divisions which are as follows:Textile Sizing Chemicals- into manufacturing and marketing a comprehensive range of performance chemicals for the sizing of warp yarns. The company markets this product successfully in India and overseas.Unsaturated & Saturated Polyester Resins - into manufacturing of unsaturated polyester resins for composite applications of all kinds such as chemical equipments, transportation and marine, construction and architecture.Garment Wash Chemicals and Textile Enzymes - The company started operation of garment wash chemicals and textile enzymes. The company markets this product in India, Bangladesh, Gulf Cooperation Council countries and Kenya. A full range of garment finishing chemicals and auxiliaries are manufactured and sold together with the enzyme formulations to the garment manufacturing industry in these countries.Laundry & Cleaning Chemicals - Company commenced manufacturing of laundry and cleaning chemicals, which is primarily aimed at institutional & industrial users.Textile Auxiliaries - this division manufactures full range of chemicals for the textile and fabric manufacturing process, pre-treatment, dyeing & printing, finishing & special applications.
